name: @dysporium/notedf
description: Note Data Format - A simple, compact, model-optimized data format

scripts.build: tsc && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = 'dist/cli.js'; if (fs.existsSync(path)) { fs.chmodSync(path, '755'); }"
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const dir = 'dist'; if (fs.existsSync(dir)) { fs.rmSync(dir, { recursive: true, force: true }); }"

author: Dysporium
